adrFormatAddress: 936 Broadway, New York, NY 10010, USA

originalText.text: My partner and I are pleased to share our overwhelmingly positive experience with our real estate agent, Kevin Stefanak, and express gratitude for his exceptional services. Throughout our journey in the competitive real estate market of NYC, Kevin consistently demonstrated outstanding communication skills and impeccable punctuality. His unwavering commitment to addressing even the smallest of concerns proved invaluable, offering us peace of mind during an otherwise chaotic process. Kevin's adeptness in navigating the difficulties of the NYC real estate market greatly facilitated our property search, ensuring we were well-informed and empowered to make sound decisions. His dedication to assisting us with any challenges that arose further solidified his commendable professionalism. Ultimately, Kevin's guidance and support contributed significantly to our successful real estate endeavor, and his services come highly recommended to anyone seeking a reliable and proficient real estate agent in NYC. We love Kevin!!!

originalText.text:
We wanted to purchase an apartment last year but were new to the NYC market.  What a stroke of luck that we connected with Kevin Stefanak!  To say that he is hard working is an understatement - he never stops working!  Kevin is honest and has the highest degree of integrity.  He patiently guided us through the  arduous buying process while always looking out for our best interests.
We love our new apartment, but if and when we decide to sell, Kevin will be our first call.

originalText.text: I recently used Kevin as my real estate agent when looking to purchase my first property here in Manhattan. Typically, these deals can be filled with headaches, obstacles and uncertainty due to the strict process in place but Kevin ensured a positive experience from the beginning and he delivered. As I write this now, I am happily moved in/settled into my dream apartment and I have Kevin and his team to thank for it. I highly recommend!

originalText.text: Kevin was fabulous to work with. He was always professional, calm and thorough. I couldn’t have worked with a better realtor on a NYC condo purchase.
